comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eduardo_Su%C3%A1rez_Mujica Eduardo Suarez Mujica (April 31, 1859 - April 22, 1922), was the Chilean Ambassador to the United States in 1914 and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs from 1917 to 1918
